description: The National Research Council of Canada’s Transportation Engineering Centre (NRC-TEC) requires engineering services to conduct the background research, engineering design and development of a reconfigurable driver-in-the-loop (DIL) simulation system to support NRC-TEC’s research in heavy-duty highway and off-road vehicle systems. full_summary:
**Design and Development of a Reconfigurable Driver-in-the-Loop Simulation System**

* **Tender Reference Number**: PW-22-01005674
* **Solicitation Number**: 22-58041
* **Publication Date**: August 30, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: September 13, 2022, 2:00 PM Eastern Time
* **Contracting Party**: National Research Council Canada
* **Service Location**: Ontario, Canada (excluding National Capital Region)

**Objective**
The National Research Council of Canada's Transportation Engineering Centre (NRC-TEC) invites contractors to provide engineering services for the design and development of a reconfigurable driver-in-the-loop (DIL) simulation system for heavy-duty highway and off-road vehicle systems. The selected service provider will conduct background research and carry out the engineering design and development of the simulator system, which will support NRC-TEC's research programs in ground transportation.

**Tender Requirements**
The required services include:

* Background research in support of NRC-TEC's research programs
* Engineering design and development of a reconfigurable DIL simulator system
* System testing and validation
* Technical support and implementation of the system
